items.summary: Update the backend Stories dataset so Stories use King James Version (KJV) text and include all major Bible stories, where each story contains only the verses that carry the narrative (i.e., the story text) rather than every verse in the surrounding chapters.
Update the backend Daily Verse curated set so all daily verse texts are in King James Version (KJV) wording.
Update the Story detail UI to present the story as narrative verse text followed by a summary at the bottom (instead of showing the summary near the top and labeling verses as "Key Verses").
